text: Júlio César Clemente Pereira Baptista (born 1 October 1981) is a Brazilian football manager and former player who played as an attacking midfielder or a forward. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Continental Continental Total Total Club Season League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Brazil League League Copa do Brasil Copa do Brasil League Cup League Cup South America South America Total Total São Paulo 2000 Série A 14 0 - - 5 1 19 1 2001 Série A 25 4 5 4 - 6 1 36 9 2002 Série A 21 3 5 0 - - 26 3 2003 Série A 15 3 7 2 - - 22 5 Spain League League Copa del Rey Copa del Rey Copa de la Liga Copa de la Liga Europe Europe Total Total Sevilla 2003–04 La Liga 30 20 6 4 - - 36 24 2004–05 La Liga 33 18 2 0 - 8 5 43 23 Real Madrid 2005–06 La Liga 32 8 6 1 - 7 0 45 9 England League League FA Cup FA Cup League Cup League Cup Europe Europe Total Total Arsenal 2006–07 Premier League 24 3 4 0 3 6 4 1 35 10 Spain League League Copa del Rey Copa del Rey Copa de la Liga Copa de la Liga Europe Europe Total Total Real Madrid 2007–08 La Liga 27 3 1 0 - 3 1 31 4 Italy League League Coppa Italia Coppa Italia League Cup League Cup Europe Europe Total Total Roma 2008–09 Serie A 27 9 2 0 - 7 2 36 11 2009–10 Serie A 23 3 2 1 - 0 0 25 4 2010–11 Serie A 7 0 1 0 8 0 Spain League League Copa del Rey Copa del Rey Copa de la Liga Copa de la Liga Europe Europe Total Total Málaga 2010–11 La Liga 11 9 0 0 - 0 0 11 9 2011–12 La Liga 4 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 4 1 2012–13 La Liga 14 4 0 0 0 0 4 0 18 4 Brazil 75 10 17 6 - 11 2 103 18 Spain 151 63 15 5 - 22 6 188 74 England 24 3 4 0 3 6 4 1 35 10 Italy 57 12 4 1 - 8 2 69 15 Total 307 88 40 12 3 6 45 11 395 117 ===International=== :Updated 2 July 2010.
